00108 BOOLEAN EnterBobbyRShipments()
00109 {
00110   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00111 
00112       InitBobbyRWoodBackground();
00113 
00114       // load the Order Grid graphic and add it
00115       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00116       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BobbyRay_OnOrder.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00117       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBobbyRShipmentGrid));
00118 
00119 
00120       guiBobbyRShipmentBackImage =  LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\CatalogueButton.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00121       guiBobbyRShipmetBack = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiBobbyRShipmentBackImage, BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_BACK], BOBBYR_GUNS_BUTTON_FONT, 
00122                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_ON, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00123                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_OFF, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00124                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00125                                                                                BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_BACK_BUTTON_X, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_BACK_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00126                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnBobbyRShipmentBackCallback);
00127       SetButtonCursor( guiBobbyRShipmetBack, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00128 
00129 
00130       giBobbyRShipmentHomeImage =  UseLoadedButtonImage( guiBobbyRShipmentBackImage, -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00131       guiBobbyRShipmentHome = CreateIconAndTextButton( giBobbyRShipmentHomeImage, BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_HOME], BOBBYR_GUNS_BUTTON_FONT, 
00132                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_ON, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00133                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_OFF, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00134                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00135                                                                                BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_HOME_BUTTON_X, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_HOME_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00136                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnBobbyRShipmentHomeCallback);
00137       SetButtonCursor( guiBobbyRShipmentHome, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00138 
00139       CreateBobbyRayOrderTitle();
00140 
00141       giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment = -1;
00142 
00143       //if there are shipments
00144       if( giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment != 0 )
00145       {
00146             INT32 iCnt;
00147 
00148             //get the first shipment #
00149             for( iCnt=0; iCnt<giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment; iCnt++ )
00150             {
00151                   if( gpNewBobbyrShipments[iCnt].fActive )
00152                         giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment = iCnt;
00153             }
00154       }
00155 
00156       CreatePreviousShipmentsMouseRegions();
00157 
00158       return( TRUE );
00159 }

00161 void ExitBobbyRShipments()
00162 {
00163       DeleteBobbyRWoodBackground();
00164       DestroyBobbyROrderTitle();
00165 
00166       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBobbyRShipmentGrid);
00167 
00168       UnloadButtonImage( guiBobbyRShipmentBackImage );
00169       UnloadButtonImage( giBobbyRShipmentHomeImage );
00170       RemoveButton( guiBobbyRShipmetBack );
00171       RemoveButton( guiBobbyRShipmentHome );
00172 
00173       RemovePreviousShipmentsMouseRegions();
00174 }

00176 void HandleBobbyRShipments()
00177 {
00178       if( gfBobbyRShipmentsDirty )
00179       {
00180             gfBobbyRShipmentsDirty = FALSE;
00181 
00182             RenderBobbyRShipments();
00183       }
00184 }

00186 void RenderBobbyRShipments()
00187 {
00188 //  HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00189 
00190       DrawBobbyRWoodBackground();
00191 
00192       DrawBobbyROrderTitle();
00193 
00194       //Output the title
00195       DrawTextToScreen(gzBobbyRShipmentText[ BOBBYR_SHIPMENT__TITLE ], BOBBYR_ORDER_FORM_TITLE_X, BOBBYR_ORDER_FORM_TITLE_Y, BOBBYR_ORDER_FORM_TITLE_WIDTH, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_TITLE_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_TITLE_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00196 
00197       DisplayShipmentGrid();
00198 
00199       if( giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment != -1 && 
00200                   gpNewBobbyrShipments[ giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment ].fActive &&
00201                   gpNewBobbyrShipments[ giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment ].fDisplayedInShipmentPage )
00202       {
00203 //          DisplayPurchasedItems( FALSE, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_GRID_X, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_GRID_Y, &LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray[giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment].BobbyRayPurchase[0], FALSE );
00204             DisplayPurchasedItems( FALSE, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_GRID_X, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_GRID_Y, &gpNewBobbyrShipments[giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment].BobbyRayPurchase[0], FALSE, giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment );
00205       }
00206       else
00207       {
00208 //          DisplayPurchasedItems( FALSE, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_GRID_X, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_GRID_Y, &LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray[giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment].BobbyRayPurchase[0], TRUE );
00209             DisplayPurchasedItems( FALSE, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_GRID_X, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_GRID_Y, NULL, TRUE, giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment );
00210       }
00211 
00212       DisplayShipmentTitles();
00213       DisplayPreviousShipments();
00214 
00215   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00216       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00217   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00218 }
00219 
00220 void BtnBobbyRShipmentBackCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00221 {
00222       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00223       {
00224             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00225             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00226       }
00227       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00228       {
00229             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00230 
00231             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_MAILORDER;
00232 
00233             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00234       }
00235       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00236       {
00237             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00238             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00239       }
00240 } 
00241 
00242 
00243 void BtnBobbyRShipmentHomeCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00244 {
00245       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00246       {
00247             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00248             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00249       }
00250       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00251       {
00252             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00253 
00254             guiCurrentLaptopMode  = LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R;
00255 
00256             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00257       }
00258       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00259       {
00260             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00261             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00262       }
00263 }

00266 void DisplayShipmentGrid()
00267 {
00268   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00269 
00270       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBobbyRShipmentGrid);
00271 
00272       // Shipment Order Grid
00273   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_DELIVERY_GRID_X, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_DELIVERY_GRID_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00274 
00275       // Order Grid
00276   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 1, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_GRID_X, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_GRID_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00277 }

00281 void DisplayShipmentTitles()
00282 {
00283       //output the order #
00284       DrawTextToScreen( gzBobbyRShipmentText[BOBBYR_SHIPMENT__ORDERED_ON], BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_SHIPMENT_ORDER_NUM_X, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_SHIPMENT_ORDER_NUM_Y, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_NUM_WIDTH, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00285 
00286       //Output the # of items
00287       DrawTextToScreen( gzBobbyRShipmentText[BOBBYR_SHIPMENT__NUM_ITEMS], BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_NUM_ITEMS_X, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_NUM_ITEMS_Y, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_NUM_ITEMS_WIDTH, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00288 }

00290 void DisplayPreviousShipments()
00291 {
00292       UINT32 uiCnt;
00293       CHAR16      zText[512];
00294       UINT16      usPosY = BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_NUM_START_Y;
00295       UINT32      uiNumItems = CountNumberValidShipmentForTheShipmentsPage();
00296       UINT32      uiNumberItemsInShipments = 0;
00297       UINT32      uiItemCnt;
00298       UINT8       ubFontColor = BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR;
00299 
00300       //loop through all the shipments
00301       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<uiNumItems; uiCnt++ )
00302       {
00303             //if it is a valid shipment, and can be displayed at bobby r
00304             if( gpNewBobbyrShipments[ uiCnt ].fActive &&
00305                         gpNewBobbyrShipments[ giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment ].fDisplayedInShipmentPage )
00306             {
00307                   if( uiCnt == (UINT32)giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment )
00308                   {
00309                         ubFontColor = FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE;
00310                   }
00311                   else
00312                   {
00313                         ubFontColor = BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR;
00314                   }
00315 
00316                   //Display the "ordered on day num"
00317                   swprintf( zText, L"%s %d", gpGameClockString[0], gpNewBobbyrShipments[ uiCnt ].uiOrderedOnDayNum );
00318                   DrawTextToScreen( zText, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_NUM_X, usPosY, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_NUM_WIDTH, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, ubFontColor, 0, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00319 
00320                   uiNumberItemsInShipments = 0;
00321 
00322       //          for( uiItemCnt=0; uiItemCnt<LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray[ uiCnt ].ubNumberPurchases; uiItemCnt++ )
00323                   for( uiItemCnt=0; uiItemCnt<gpNewBobbyrShipments[ uiCnt ].ubNumberPurchases; uiItemCnt++ )
00324                   {
00325       //                uiNumberItemsInShipments += LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray[ uiCnt ].BobbyRayPurchase[uiItemCnt].ubNumberPurchased;
00326                         uiNumberItemsInShipments += gpNewBobbyrShipments[ uiCnt ].BobbyRayPurchase[uiItemCnt].ubNumberPurchased;
00327                   }
00328 
00329                   //Display the # of items
00330                   swprintf( zText, L"%d", uiNumberItemsInShipments );
00331                   DrawTextToScreen( zText, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_NUM_ITEMS_X, usPosY, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_NUM_ITEMS_WIDTH, BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, ubFontColor, 0, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00332                   usPosY += BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_GAP_BTN_LINES;
00333             }
00334       }
00335 }
00336 
00337 void CreatePreviousShipmentsMouseRegions()
00338 {
00339       UINT32 uiCnt;
00340       UINT16      usPosY = BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_NUM_START_Y;
00341       UINT16      usWidth = BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_DELIVERY_GRID_WIDTH;
00342       UINT16      usHeight = GetFontHeight( BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_STATIC_TEXT_FONT );
00343       UINT32      uiNumItems = CountNumberOfBobbyPurchasesThatAreInTransit();
00344 
00345       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<uiNumItems; uiCnt++ )
00346       {
00347             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedPreviousShipmentsRegion[uiCnt], BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_NUM_X, usPosY, (UINT16)(BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_ORDER_NUM_X+usWidth), (UINT16)(usPosY+usHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00348                                                  CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectPreviousShipmentsRegionCallBack );
00349             MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedPreviousShipmentsRegion[uiCnt]); 
00350             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedPreviousShipmentsRegion[uiCnt], 0, uiCnt);
00351 
00352             usPosY += BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_GAP_BTN_LINES;
00353       }
00354 }
00355 
00356 void RemovePreviousShipmentsMouseRegions()
00357 {
00358       UINT32 uiCnt;
00359       UINT32      uiNumItems = CountNumberOfBobbyPurchasesThatAreInTransit();
00360 
00361 
00362       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<uiNumItems; uiCnt++ )
00363       {
00364         MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedPreviousShipmentsRegion[uiCnt] );
00365       }
00366 }
00367 
00368 void SelectPreviousShipmentsRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00369 {
00370       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00371       {
00372       }
00373       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00374       {
00375             INT32 iSlotID = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00376 
00377 
00378             if( CountNumberOfBobbyPurchasesThatAreInTransit() > iSlotID )
00379             {
00380                   INT32 iCnt;
00381                   INT32 iValidShipmentCounter=0;
00382 
00383                   giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment = -1;
00384 
00385                   //loop through and get the "x" iSlotID shipment
00386                   for( iCnt=0; iCnt<giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment; iCnt++ )
00387                   {
00388                         if( gpNewBobbyrShipments[iCnt].fActive )
00389                         {
00390                               if( iValidShipmentCounter == iSlotID )
00391                               {
00392                                     giBobbyRShipmentSelectedShipment = iCnt;
00393                               }
00394 
00395                               iValidShipmentCounter++;
00396                         }
00397                   }
00398             }
00399 
00400             gfBobbyRShipmentsDirty = TRUE;
00401       }
00402 }
00403 
00404 INT32 CountNumberValidShipmentForTheShipmentsPage()
00405 {
00406       if( giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment > BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_NUM_PREVIOUS_SHIPMENTS )
00407             return( BOBBYR_SHIPMENT_NUM_PREVIOUS_SHIPMENTS );
00408       else
00409             return( giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment );
00410 }
